data.title: What Would Spidey Do?
data.meta_description: Posts about Martin Scorsese written by Thomas Mets
data.text:
This is a continuation of thoughts on films I’ve seen this year. Movie #121/ New Movie #89: Black Girl (Movie Theater)This is a film that can be appreciated in its context as the first major Sub-Saharan project and a snapshot … Continue reading →

For the final entry in the films watched in 2019 series, I’m having Scorsese inspired subchallenges, with at least five films by him and at least five films he really likes: those he selected for his list of best movies … Continue reading →
